fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnlFrageamid2.pnlGetContactInfo.tblContAcct.Row1.getContactFromEAM"\,"event":"Click"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"var ContactoperationArguments = JSON.stringify({ \\"gac_GetContactByEAMID_EAMID\\": eamid.value\\n});\\nconsole.log(\\"ContactoperationArguments \\" + ContactoperationArguments);\\n$.ajax({\\n type: \\"POST\\"\,\\n url: \\"/content/dam/formsanddocuments-fdm/fdm-ceci.executeDermisQuery.json?\\"\,\\n data: {\\n \\"operationName\\": \\"gac_GetContactByEAMID()\\"\,\\n \\"operationArguments\\": ContactoperationArguments\\n }\,\\n success: function(data\, textStatus\, jqXHR) {\\n console.log(data); console.log(\\"data.contactid:\\" + data.contactid);\\n contactid.value = data.contactid;\\n if (data === 'null') {\\n console.log(\\"--> Contact is null\\");\\n emailaddress.visible = true;\\n gac_GetContactByEmail_EmailAddress.visible = true;\\n txPleaseEnterInvite.visible = true;\\n } else {\\n var ContactoperationArguments = JSON.stringify({ \\"contactid\\": contactid.value\\n });\\n console.log(\\"ContactoperationArguments \\" + ContactoperationArguments);\\n $.ajax({\\n type: \\"POST\\"\,\\n url: \\"/content/dam/formsanddocuments-fdm/fdm-ceciexecuteDermisQuery.json?\\"\,\\n data: {\\n \\"operationName\\": \\"GET contact /contacts\\"\,\\n \\"operationArguments\\": ContactoperationArguments\\n }\,\\n success: function(data\, textStatus\, jqXHR) {\\n console.log(data); console.log(\\"data[0].egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid:\\" + data[0].egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid);\\n console.log(\\"data[0].firstname:\\" + data[0].firstname); console.log(\\"data[0].lastname:\\" + data[0].lastname);\\n Row2.firstname.value = data[0].firstname;\\n Row2.lastname.value = data[0].lastname;\\n accountid.value = data[0].egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid;\\n continue2application.visible = true;\\n }\,\\n error: function(XMLHttpRequest\, textStatus\, errorThrown) {\\n console.log(\\"setContact -error\\");\\n }\,\\n cache: false\, async: false\\n });\\n }\\n }\,\\n error: function(XMLHttpRequest\, textStatus\, errorThrown) {\\n console.log(\\"setContact -error\\");\\n }\,\\n cache: false\, async: false\\n});"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

[{"script":{"content":"var ContactoperationArguments = JSON.stringify({\\n \\"contactid\\": contactid.value \\n});\\nconsole.log(\\"ContactoperationArguments \\" + ContactoperationArguments);\\n$.ajax({\\n type: \\"POST\\"\,\\n url: \\"/content/dam/formsanddocuments-fdm/fdm-ceci.executeDermisQuery.json?\\"\,\\n data: {\\n \\"operationName\\": \\"GET contact /contacts\\"\,\\n \\"operationArguments\\": ContactoperationArguments\\n }\,\\n success: function(data\, textStatus\, jqXHR) {\\n console.log(data);\\n console.log(\\"data[0].firstname:\\"+data[0].firstname);\\n console.log(\\"data[0].lastname:\\"+data[0].lastname);\\n console.log(\\"data[0].egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid:\\"+data[0].egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid);\\n firstname.value = data[0].firstname;\\n lastname.value = data[0].lastname;\\n// fullname.value = data[0].fullname;\\n accountid.value = data[0].egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid;\\n }\,\\n error: function(XMLHttpRequest\, textStatus\, errorThrown) { console.log(\\"setContact -error\\"); }\,\\n cache: false\,\\n async: false\\n});"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnlFrageamid2.pnlGetContactInfo.tblContAcct.Row2.GETcontactData"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnlFrageamid2.pnlGetContactInfo.gac_GetContactByEmail_EmailAddress"\,"event":"Click"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"var vEmailAddress = (emailaddress.value).trim();\\nvar ContactoperationArguments = JSON.stringify({\\n \\"gac_GetContactByEmail_EmailAddress\\": vEmailAddress\\n});\\nif(getDebugMode()){ console.log(\\"--->Search--ContactoperationArguments \\" + ContactoperationArguments);}\\n\\nvar operationName = \\"gac_GetContactByEmail()\\";\\nvar operationArguments = ContactoperationArguments;\\n\\nvar vContactEmailData = execCRMService(operationName\, operationArguments);\\nif(getDebugMode()){ console.log(\\"2-vContactEmailData:\\" + vContactEmailData);}\\n\\nif (vContactEmailData === null) {\\n if(getDebugMode()){ console.log(\\"4-Contact is null:\\" + contactid.value);}\\n emailaddress.visible = true;\\n noemailexists.visible = true;\\n registernew.visible = true;\\n registernew.enabled = true;\\n}\\nelse {\\n emailaddress.enabled = false;\\n if(getDebugMode()){ console.log(\\"Email Found-contactID: \\" + vContactEmailData.contactid);}\\n contactid.value = vContactEmailData.contactid;\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"contactid\\"\, vContactEmailData.contactid);\\n noemailexists.visible = false;\\n invitecode.visible = true;\\n RedeemInviteCode.visible = true;\\n gac_GetContactByEmail_EmailAddress.visible = false;\\n txInvite.visible = true;\\n RedeemInviteCode.visible = true;\\n}\\n\\n"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:rules.fd:valueCommit: [{"nodeName":"ROOT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"EVENT_CONDITION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"COMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnleamid2.invitecode"\,"type":"STRING"\,"name":"invitecode"}}\,{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON_OPERATOR"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"IS_NOT_EMPTY"\,"value":null}}\,{"nodeName":"PRIMITIVE_EXPRESSION"\,"choice":null}]}\,"nested":false}\,{"nodeName":"Then"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"ENABLE_STATEMENT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnleamid2.RedeemInviteCode"\,"displayName":"RedeemInviteCode"\,"type":"BUTTON"\,"displayPath":"FORM/Root Panel/pnleamid2/RedeemInviteCode/"\,"name":"RedeemInviteCode"\,"parent":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnleamid2"}}]}}]}]}}]\,"isValid":true\,"enabled":true\,"version":1\,"script":"/**\\n\\n * This is a machine-generated code for the rule.\\n * If you modify it in the code editor\, you will not be able to view and edit the rule in the visual editor.\\n */\\n\\nif (( this.value !== null && this.value !== \\"\\" )) {\\n RedeemInviteCode.enabled = true;\\n}\\n"\,"eventName":"Value Commit"\,"ruleType":""\,"description":""}]

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"console.log(\\"Redeem Invite code - Click-Nov04A\\");\\nvar vInviteCode = (invitecode.value).trim();\\n\\n\\nvar redeemOperationArgs = JSON.stringify({\\n \\"contact_contactid\\": sessionStorage.getItem(\\"contactid\\")\,\\n \\"contact_gac_RedeemInviteCode_InviteCode\\": vInviteCode\,\\n \\"contact_gac_RedeemInviteCode_EAMID\\": sessionStorage.getItem(\\"eamid\\")\,\\n \\"contact_gac_RedeemInviteCode_TargetPortalApplication\\": \\"CECI\\"\\n});\\nconsole.log(\\"redeemOperationArgs \\" + redeemOperationArgs);\\nvar operationName = \\"contacts/Microsoft.Dynamics.CRM.gac_RedeemInviteCode()\\";\\nvar operationArguments = redeemOperationArgs;\\nvar vContactRedeemData = execCRMService(operationName\, operationArguments);\\n\\nif ('errorMessage' in vContactRedeemData) {\\n var str = vContactRedeemData.errorMessage;\\n console.log(\\"vContactRedeemData.errorMessage: \\" + vContactRedeemData.errorMessage);\\n str = str.slice(13); // console.log(str.slice(13));\\n var strEndPosition = str.search('\\"');\\n var newStr = str.substring(0\, strEndPosition - 1);\\n newStr = \\"ERROR - \\" + newStr + \\" - Please enter another invite code\\";\\n var a = 1;\\n txErrorMessage.value = newStr;\\n txErrorMessage.visible = true;\\n txErrorMessage.enabled = false;\\n} else if ('result' in vContactRedeemData) {\\n console.log(\\"vContactRedeemData.result-->\\" + vContactRedeemData.result);\\n //\\"{\\"result\\":\\"No response\\"}\\"\\n //\\n txMsgRedeemSuccess.visible = true;\\n continue2application.visible = true;\\n this.visible = false;\\n invitecode.enabled = false;\\n this.enable = false;\\n txErrorMessage.visible = false;\\n var vObjData = getContactObjArray();\\n console.log(\\"vObjData: \\" + vObjData);\\n console.log(\\"vObjData.fullname: \\" + vObjData[0].fullname);\\n tblProposals.Row1.fullname.value = vObjData[0].fullname;\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"fullname\\"\, vObjData[0].fullname);\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"emailaddress1\\"\, vObjData[0].emailaddress1);\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"telephone1\\"\, vObjData[0].telephone1);\\n\\n /* console.log(\\"RedeemInviteCode - Click: gac-aem-appId = \\" + vRdmsTargetEnvProposalAppId);\\n vObjData = getAccountObjArray();\\n console.log(\\"vObjData.name: \\" + vObjData[0].name);\\n tblProposals.Row1.name.value = vObjData[0].name;*/\\n var accountOperationArguments = JSON.stringify({\\n \\"accountid\\": sessionStorage.getItem(\\"accountid\\")\\n });\\n console.log(\\"accountOperationArguments:\\" + accountOperationArguments);\\n\\n var operationName = \\"GET account /accounts\\";\\n var operationArguments = accountOperationArguments;\\n\\n var vAccountData = execCRMService(operationName\, operationArguments);\\n\\n if (getDebugMode()) { console.log(\\"1-vAccountData:\\" + vAccountData); }\\n console.log(\\"2-vAccountData:\\" + vAccountData); console.log(\\"vAccountData[0].name:\\" + vAccountData[0].name);\\n console.log(\\"vAccountData[0].accountid:\\" + vAccountData[0].accountid);\\n tblProposals.Row1.name.value = vAccountData[0].name;\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"organizationName:\\"\, vAccountData[0].name);\\n Start.enabled = true;\\n section1.visible = true;\\n pnlGetContactInfo.visible = false;\\n\\n var callStatus = checkCFP4StartClose();\\n console.log(\\"callStatus: \\" + callStatus);\\n\\n if (callStatus == \\"cBeforeCallStart\\") {\\n console.log(\\" Today is less than start\\");\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.title = \\"Inactive\\";\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.enabled = false;\\n }\\n else if (callStatus == \\"cAfterCallClose\\") {\\n console.log(\\" is greater than close\\");\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.title = \\"Closed\\";\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.enabled = false;\\n }\\n else {\\n if ((sessionStorage.getItem(\\"gac_fundingapplicationstatus\\")) == \\"810510001\\") {\\n Start.title = \\"Submitted\\";\\n }\\n else {\\n console.log(\\"between start and close\\");\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac-aem-appId\\"\, vRdmsTargetEnvProposalAppId);\\n console.log(\\"gac-aem-appId: \\" + vRdmsTargetEnvProposalAppId);\\n var vDraftId = getDraftId(sessionStorage.getItem(\\"accountid\\")\, sessionStorage.getItem(\\"foprofileid\\"));\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac_saveddraftid\\"\, vDraftId);\\n if ((vDraftId === null || vDraftId === \\"\\")) {\\n var vProfileID = createStubProposal();\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"fcprofileid\\"\, vProfileID);\\n }\\n else {\\n var buttonValues = getDraftProposalStatusReturn2();// the following 3 lines added to get and return button title and dis/enable\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.title = buttonValues[0];\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.enabled = buttonValues[1];\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n\\n}\\n\\n"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnlFrageamid2.pnlGetContactInfo.RedeemInviteCode"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"var vAccountID = createAccountExec(\\"aaaEgcs_operatingname_en\\");\\nconsole.log(\\"landingPage->Jun30a-Register new contact - Click - vAccountID: \\"+vAccountID);\\n//guideRootPanel.contactid.value = test4();\\n//var vContactID = createContactExec(\\"aaaFirstname\\"\, \\"aaaEmail\\"\, vAccountID); bb-Aug2-commented this line\\n//console.log(\\"Register new contact - Click - vContactID: \\"+vContactID);\\nsessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac-aem-masterId\\"\,vAccountID);\\nsessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac-aem-appId\\"\,vRdmsTargetEnvAccountAppId);\\nconsole.log(\\"Register new contact - Click: gac-aem-appId = \\"+ vRdmsTargetEnvAccountAppId);\\n\\n//Aug3-cs-removed 'wcmmode=disabled' per request from PatV since AEM Dispatcher Blocks it.\\n//Aug3-cs-added the following line to fetch URL param 'afAcceptLang'\, then append to destination URL\, to support language workflow.\\n//Aug3-cs-Note to use 'lang' setting you need 'urlParams' setting as well.\\nvar urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar lang = urlParams.get('afAcceptLang');\\nsessionStorage.setItem(\\"lang\\"\,lang);\\n\\nwindow.open('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/ceci/registration_form/jcr:content?' + 'afAcceptLang=' +lang\,'_self');\\n\\n//below opens in new tab---> do not use\\n//guidelib.util.GuideUtil.navigateToURL('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/ceci/proposal_form/jcr:content?wcmmode=disabled'\,'_self');\\n\\n"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnlFrageamid2.pnlGetContactInfo.registernew"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"//LandingPage-Click-Start-Edit--- can be either\\n//console.log(\\"#--- LandingPage - Click-Start-TOP\\");\\n// Aug 17 scaffic\\n// Added code to support using Language toggle from Portal Broker\\ntestjs();\\n// June 16 Delete since its set in the CreateStubProposal Code Section in fdmfuncs\\nsessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac_fundingapplicationstatus\\"\,\\"810510000\\");\\n\\nvar vDebugMode = \\"\\";\\n\\nif (getDebugMode()) {\\n\\tvDebugMode = \\"&afDebug\\";\\n\\tconsole.log(\\"#--- LandingPage - Click-Start-Edit-Button\\");\\n}\\n\\n//Aug17-scaffic-added the following line to fetch URL param 'afAcceptLang'\, then append to destination URL\, to support language workflow.\\n//Aug17-scaffic-Note to use 'lang' setting you need 'urlParams' setting as well.\\nvar urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar lang = urlParams.get('afAcceptLang');\\nsessionStorage.setItem(\\"lang\\"\,lang);\\nvar vGac_saveddraftid = sessionStorage.getItem(\\"gac_saveddraftid\\");\\n\\n//besco-Sep30 --> the following two lines moved from button \\"redeemInviteCode\\" \\nif (vGac_saveddraftid === \\"\\") {\\n console.log(\\"inside createStub test - set to empty string\\");\\nvar vFcprofileid = createStubProposal();\\nsessionStorage.setItem(\\"fcprofileid\\"\, vFcprofileid);\\n}\\nwindow.open('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/ceci/proposal_form/jcr:content?' + 'afAcceptLang=' +lang +vDebugMode\,'_self');\\n\\n//below opens in new tab---> do not use\\n//guidelib.util.GuideUtil.navigateToURL('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/ceci/proposal_form/jcr:content?wcmmode=disabled'\,'_self');\\n\\n"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.section1.importantNotesPanel.tblProposals.Row1.Start"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

}\,\\n cache: false\,\\n async: false\\n});\\nvar accountOperationArguments = JSON.stringify({\\n \\"accountid\\": accountid.value\\n});\\nconsole.log(\\"accountOperationArguments: \\" + accountOperationArguments);\\n$.ajax({\\n type: \\"POST\\"\,\\n url: \\"/content/dam/formsanddocuments-fdm/fdm-ceci.executeDermisQuery.json?\\"\,\\n data: {\\n \\"operationName\\": \\"GET account /accounts\\"\,\\n \\"operationArguments\\": accountOperationArguments\\n }\,\\n success: function(data\, textStatus\, jqXHR) {\\n console.log(data);\\n console.log(\\"data[0].egcs_operatingname_en\\"+data[0].egcs_operatingname_en);\\n console.log(\\"data[0].accountid\\"+data[0].accountid);\\n egcs_operatingname_en.value = data[0].egcs_operatingname_en;\\n Start.enabled = true;\\n }\,\\n error: function(XMLHttpRequest\, textStatus\, errorThrown) {\\n console.log(\\"ERROR-GETaccountData - Click\\"); }\,\\n cache: false\,\\n async: false\\n});"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:rules.fd:valueCommit: [{"nodeName":"ROOT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"EVENT_CONDITION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"COMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"guide.guideRootPanel.cancelConfirmationPanel.section.wnatToCancel"\,"type":"RADIO BUTTON|FIELD|AFCOMPONENT|STRING"\,"name":"wnatToCancel"}}\,{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON_OPERATOR"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EQUALS_TO"\,"value":null}}\,{"nodeName":"PRIMITIVE_EXPRESSION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"STRING_LITERAL"\,"value":"1"}}]}\,"nested":false}\,{"nodeName":"Then"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"NAVIGATE_TO"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"URL_LITERAL"\,"value":"https://pi.international.gc.ca/pages/public/welcome-accueil.xhtml"}\,{"nodeName":"in"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"NAVIGATE_METHOD_OPTIONS"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"NEW_TAB"\,"items":[]}}]}}]}]}}]\,"isValid":true\,"enabled":false\,"version":1\,"script":"/**\\n\\n * This is a machine-generated code for the rule.\\n * If you modify it in the code editor\, you will not be able to view and edit the rule in the visual editor.\\n */\\n\\nif (this.value == \\"1\\") {\\n guidelib.util.GuideUtil.navigateToURL('https://pi.international.gc.ca/pages/public/welcome-accueil.xhtml'\,'NEW_TAB');\\n}\\n"\,"eventName":"Value Commit"\,"ruleType":""\,"description":""}]

fd:scripts.fd:valueCommit: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.cancelConfirmationPanel.section.wnatToCancel"\,"event":"Value Commit"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"if (this.value == \\"1\\") {\\n window.open('https://pi.international.gc.ca/pages/public/welcome-accueil.xhtml'\,'_self');\\n}\\nelse{\\n cancelConfirmationPanel.visible = false;\\n if(previousNamePanel.value === 'section1'){\\n section1.visible = true;\\n }\\n else{\\n section2.visible = true;\\n }\\n}"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:init: [{"script":{"content":"console.log(\\"landingPage-Init-Mar23a-Besco\\");\\n//Aug5-added lang code below\\nvar urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar lang = urlParams.get('afAcceptLang');\\nsetDebugMode();\\nsessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac_saveddraftid\\"\, \\"\\"); //besco-init 'gac_saveddraftid' since it may have a 'get' later\\n\\nget_tp_profile(); //get \\"Program\\" id and name = \\"FDI CanExport\\"\\ngetSetFoProfileId(); //sessionStorage.setItem(\\"foprofileid\\"\, \\"68995D00-B104-EB11-96A4-00505681CF84\\");\\negcs_name_enCFP.value = sessionStorage.getItem(\\"foprofilename\\"); //\\nProposal.value = sessionStorage.getItem(\\"tpprofilename\\"); //\\n\\ntblContAcct.visible = false;\\neamid.value = sessionStorage.getItem(\\"eamid\\");\\nvar vEamid = sessionStorage.getItem(\\"eamid\\");\\nvar operationArguments = JSON.stringify({\\n \\"gac_GetContactByEAMID_EAMID\\": vEamid\\n});\\nconsole.log(\\"1-operationArguments: \\" + operationArguments);\\nvar operationName = \\"gac_GetContactByEAMID()\\";\\n//var operationArguments = vEamContactOpArgs;\\nvar vContactData = execCRMService(operationName\, operationArguments);\\n\\nif (vContactData === null) {\\n console.log(\\"--> Contact is null\\");\\n emailaddress.visible = true;\\n gac_GetContactByEmail_EmailAddress.visible = true;\\n txPleaseEnterInvite.visible = true;\\n // this was done at the top -->sessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac_saveddraftid\\"\, \\"\\"); //besco-Sep30 = create the proposalStub if this value is empty string.\\n\\n} else {\\n console.log(\\"vContactData:\\" + vContactData);\\n console.log(\\"vContactData.contactid:\\" + vContactData.contactid);\\n console.log(\\"***********did it get here?\\");\\n contactid.value = vContactData.contactid;\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"contactid\\"\, vContactData.contactid);\\n\\n var ContactoperationArguments = JSON.stringify({\\n \\"contactid\\": contactid.value\\n });\\n console.log(\\"ContactoperationArguments \\" + ContactoperationArguments);\\n var operationName = \\"GET contact /contacts\\";\\n var operationArguments = ContactoperationArguments;\\n var vContactData = execCRMService(operationName\, operationArguments);\\n\\n console.log(\\"1-vContactData:\\" + vContactData); console.log(\\"vContactData[0].egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid:\\" + vContactData[0].egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid); console.log(\\"vContactData[0].firstname:\\" + vContactData[0].firstname);\\n Row2.firstname.value = vContactData[0].firstname;\\n tblProposals.Row1.fullname.value = vContactData[0].fullname;\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"fullname\\"\, vContactData[0].fullname);\\n\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"emailaddress1\\"\, vContactData[0].emailaddress1);\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"telephone1\\"\, vContactData[0].telephone1);\\n\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"accountid\\"\, vContactData[0].egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid);\\n continue2application.visible = true;\\n var accountOperationArguments = JSON.stringify({\\n \\"accountid\\": sessionStorage.getItem(\\"accountid\\")\\n });\\n console.log(\\"accountOperationArguments:\\" + accountOperationArguments);\\n\\n var operationName = \\"GET account /accounts\\";\\n var operationArguments = accountOperationArguments;\\n\\n var vAccountData = execCRMService(operationName\, operationArguments);\\n\\n if (getDebugMode()) { console.log(\\"1-vAccountData:\\" + vAccountData); }\\n console.log(\\"2-vAccountData:\\" + vAccountData); console.log(\\"vAccountData[0].name:\\" + vAccountData[0].name);\\n console.log(\\"vAccountData[0].accountid:\\" + vAccountData[0].accountid);\\n tblProposals.Row1.name.value = vAccountData[0].name;\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"organizationName:\\"\, vAccountData[0].name);\\n Start.enabled = true;\\n section1.visible = true;\\n pnlGetContactInfo.visible = false;\\n\\n var callStatus = checkCFP4StartClose();\\n console.log(\\"callStatus: \\" + callStatus);\\n\\n if (callStatus == \\"cBeforeCallStart\\") {\\n console.log(\\" Today is less than start\\");\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.title = \\"Inactive\\";\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.enabled = false;\\n }\\n else if (callStatus == \\"cAfterCallClose\\") {\\n console.log(\\" is greater than close\\");\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.title = \\"Closed\\";\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.enabled = false;\\n }\\n else {\\n if ((sessionStorage.getItem(\\"gac_fundingapplicationstatus\\")) == \\"810510001\\") {\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.title = \\"Submitted\\";\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.enabled = false;\\n }\\n else {\\n console.log(\\"between start and close\\");\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac-aem-appId\\"\, vRdmsTargetEnvProposalAppId);\\n console.log(\\"gac-aem-appId: \\" + vRdmsTargetEnvProposalAppId);\\n var vDraftId = getDraftId(sessionStorage.getItem(\\"accountid\\")\, sessionStorage.getItem(\\"foprofileid\\"));\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac_saveddraftid\\"\, vDraftId);\\n if ((vDraftId === null || vDraftId === \\"\\")) {\\n var vProfileID = createStubProposal();\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"fcprofileid\\"\, vProfileID);\\n }\\n else {\\n var buttonValues = getDraftProposalStatusReturn2();// the following 3 lines added to get and return button title and dis/enable\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.title = buttonValues[0];\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.enabled = buttonValues[1];\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n}\\n\\n"\,"event":"Initialize"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]
